column6: Hor Namhong Museum was burgled by a group of thieves
column7: who made away with valuable souvenirs.------The break-in was discovered at around 7am on the morning of September 6
column8: 2018 at the Hor Nam Hong Museum
column10: Russey Keo district.------The museum is named after HE. Hor Namhong
column11: former Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation
column12: who donated many of his personal items to the collection.------According to information
column13: thieves used bamboo poles to jemmy open a window and gain access through a door. In total 12 items belonging to  Hor Namhong
column14: including gifts from national and international guests are believed to have been taken. The monetary value is unknown
column15: but the cost to history is priceless.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/700165.html
